buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification], is applied even when Frost Demon is in the Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for orc units.
buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Orc and Undead)

buffs.description: Active skill efficiency increases even when Frost Demon is in Time Shop. ( However, when in Time shop, the efficiency is increased by 10 stages for each 5-star Frost Demon and 20 stages for each 6 star Frost Demon. Active Skill enhancements through Frost Demon cannot exceed a maximum of 480 stages. )
buffs.name: Enhance Active Skill
